sentences.sContent: Her conduct at school well merits praise.
sentences.sCn: 她在学校的表现理应受到表扬。

sentences.sContent: The little girl was bullied constantly at school.
sentences.sContent_eng: The little girl was bullied constantly at school.
sentences.sCn: 这小姑娘在学校里经常受欺侮。

sentences.sContent: She was drivelling on about her friends at school.
sentences.sContent_eng: She was drivelling on about her friends at school.
sentences.sCn: 她在没完没了地胡扯她在学校里的朋友们。
